title: Discovery Tour
description: An example of the 'Discovery Tour' mode present in games like Assassin's Creed Origins. Here, the process of evisceration is being demonstrated through in-game models. Alongside the game's graphics, real artifacts are shown and their respective museums are accredited.
creator: Ubisoft
subject: Discovery Tour

title: Notre Dame Remodel
description: A digital model of the Notre Dame Basillica in Paris created by the Ubisoft development team for Assassin's Creed Unity. When the building burnt down, scans were given to the French government in order to aid the rebuilding process.
creator: Ubisoft
subject: Assassin's Creed; Video Game; Notre Dame

title: Assassin's Creed Origins: Promotional Image
description: This is one of the images Ubisoft used to promote the game Assassin's Creed Origins which came out in 2017. For the first time in franchise history, players were able to explore Egypt in the Ptolemaic period (49-38 BCE)
creator: Ubisoft
subject: Assassin's Creed

title: Assassin's Creed (2008) Game Manual
description: This document from the original Assassin's Creed game, released in 2008 on PC, showcases the stealth-based gameplay features that initially made the franchise so beloved. As noted in the Krumplecast, the gameplay would experience a shift beginning in 2017, becoming a more historically-focused RPG with a wider world to explore.
creator: Ubisoft
subject: Stealth; Video Game

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla Interactive Map
description: A website where interactive maps of the game Assassin's Creed Valhalla can be found, set in the Viking Age. This showcases all the diverse locations that can be explored within the game, and also displays the level of detail the development team put into making these historical locations feel alive.
creator: Map Genie
subject: Vikings

title: Assassin's Creed Black Flag Sailing Ambiance
description: Audio inside the game Assassin's Creed Black Flag showcasing sailing ambiance with sea shanties. Small details like these truly immerse players into the world of the game.
subject: Pirates

title: Podcast Episode
description: The Krumplecast: Assassin's Creed Special Feature
creator: Rosario Iozzia, Gabriel Tamburro, Anthony Del Rosario
subject: Podcast; Assassin's Creed

title: Screenshot: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
description: A screenshot inside the game Assassin's Creed Odyssey which depicts the game's detailed graphics and open-world environment. Comparing this to similar shots from older games really emphasizes how the franchise changed over time.
creator: Ubisoft
subject: Video Game

title: Screenshot: Assassin's Creed Revelations
description: A screenshot inside the game Assassin's Creed Revelations. Set in Constantinople in the year 1511, the game focuses on sneaking around this urban environment and unravelling complicated plots involving beloved historical figures.
creator: Ubisoft
subject: Stealth; Video Game
